review.title: “Hectic environment, but this job teaches the importance of being detailed.”
review.pros: Pros – Managers push all employees to complete all tasks correctly in an exact manner. Also, colleagues are very supportive; it's feels like a family.
review.cons: Cons – Pay is low for the amount of work one is expected to do. The environment is extremely hectic, especially on weekends and all workers must be available to work on weekends.
